entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -1.3°C

Visibility: 2.0 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
